content: spirits of life cal will start on **october 18th 2017** and will run for 9 weeks general information is here 1 check full reveal and details here 2 important notes for the pattern are here 3 part 1 4 part 2 5 part 3 6 part 4 7 part 5 8 part 6 9 part 7 10 part 8 11 part 9 border 12 this cal is about large cozy and warm rectangle wrap approx 63 cm x 180cm inspired by native american textile and fibre art it comes in three colorways spirit of the lake spirit of the volcano and spirit of the orchid every part of the cal will be published for free on lilla bjorn s crochet world blog here 13 links to the patterns will be added later there will be written instructions charts progress pictures and partial video s available for each part the cal will be hosted in official ccc social group 14 on facebook by susan cutrer and there you will get all support you need if you like to hang on ravelry - please feel free to join my official group here 15 see you in october 1 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/10/spirits-of-life-wrap-cal-general html 2 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/08/spirits-of-life-wrap-cal-reveal html 3 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/09/spirits-of-life-wrap-cal-important-notes html 4 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/10/spirits-of-life-warp-cal-part-1 html 5 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/10/spirits-of-life-cal-part-2-mosaic html 6 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/11/spirits-of-life-cal-part-3-overlay html 7 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/11/spirits-of-life-cal-part-4-c2c-waves html 8 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/11/spirits-of-life-cal-part-5-c2c-crochet html 9 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/11/spirits-of-life-cal-part-6-overlay html 10 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/11/spirits-of-life-cal-part-7-mosaic html 11 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/12/spirits-of-life-cal-part-8-final-edge html 12 http //www lillabjorncrochet com/2017/12/spirits-of-life-cal-part-9-border html 13 www lillabjorncrochet com 14 https //www facebook com/groups/officialcccsocialgroup 15 http //www ravelry com/groups/lilla-bjorn-crochet
